actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in the State of South Carolina for the Southeast region of the United States.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of a national cemetery in the State of South Carolina for the southeast region of the United States. Provides for the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in the State of South Carolina for the Southeast region of the United States.
